publication.title: Design of Walking Gaits for Tao-Pie-Pie, a Small Humanoid Robot
publication.keyword: Autonomous Robot;Humanoid Robot;International Competitiveness;and Forward;Left Right;
publication.abstract: Abstract. This paper describes the methodology,that we used to design and im- plement balancing and walking gaits for TAO-PIE-PIE, a small 30cm tall hu- manoid robot. TAO-PIE-PIE is a fully autonomous robot with all power, sensing, and processing done on-board. It is also a minimalistic design with only six de- grees of freedom. Nevertheless, its performance is comparable to that
